ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 17th Level
ygData.msgSnippet: Just put one single point into training it. It will go up very quickly on it s own, and I expect you ll have it maxed before you hit 18. Draelon ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Just put one single point into training it. It will go up very quickly on
it's own, and I expect you'll have it maxed before you hit 18.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Rains, Darryl [mailto:dsrains@...]
Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 2:47 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] 17th Level


From: "Rains, Darryl" <dsrains@...>

I made 17th level last night and I have a question. How many, if any, extra
training points should I put into Dual Wield? I am using a combine longsword
as my primary weapon and I have a choice of either a combine scimitar or
magic whip, with lifetap I forget its name. Which should I use in the off
hand. I have been trying to get a PGT but haven't yet. I did get the Cracked
Darkwood shield.

Skarsol
Bard of the 17th song on Cazic Thule.
